short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ask approval from user to use their content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension users will be able to comment on IG posts by natively logging in to Instagram via iframe , thus helping users and brands to request approval for IG fan posts by logging to their business accounts via extension.
